newsitem.title: CHINA: China wheat imports down 72.5 pct in Jan-April.
newsitem.headline: China wheat imports down 72.5 pct in Jan-April.

text.p: China imported 550,000 tonnes of wheat in the first four months of the year, down 72.5 percent compared with the same period of 1996, customs figures showed on Wednesday.
Imports for April alone were 210,000 tonnes, the figures showed. There were no comparative figures for the month.
